metadata.title: Graphical Tweaks
metadata.author: CommunistMountain
metadata.description: 1. Map Background tweak: visual clarity is a problem when beacons appear over bright regions of the default backgrounds, or when Mike Hopley's Enhanced Fleet Pursuit mod shows dark lines over dark regions. This mod replaces the 3 backgrounds with a solid dark grey to solve this. 2. Floor Image tweak: all vanilla ships now use a more consistent floor image, revealing more of the underlying art, as well as having consistent width from walls and doors.
